dict.acceptation: 伸展；张开；充分利用；使紧张；

sent.orig: Raise your arms, Teddy Bear. Stretch! Stretch!
sent.trans: 把你的胳膊举起来，玩具熊。伸长！伸长！

sent.orig: Stretch and bi stretch to deform.
The seated calf muscle stretch: Stretch the rear muscle leg, called as the calf muscle.
sent.trans: 小腿（肠肌）伸：伸展小腿后方肌肉，也就是腓肠肌。

sent.orig: The seated hamstring stretch: Stretch the large muscle of rear of upper leg, known as hamstring.
sent.trans: 屈膝肌拉伸：伸展大腿上方的大块肌肉，也就是屈膝肌。

sent.orig: So commit to raise the bar today, stretch your horizons, and you will stretch your life.
sent.trans: 从今天开始着力于抬高标准，拓展视野，你的生命广度也将得到提升。
